channel.title: How do I make new shops?
channel.description: I checked the toturials, but like barely any of them work... How do you make new shops?

item.title: How do I make new shops?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

here, put this in a batch file.

@ECHO OFF
TITLE X I L00T U I's INSTANT SHOP MAKER!
Echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
Echo ::          MY instant shop maker       ::
Echo ::          BY: I L00T U I              ::
Echo ::	   (c) I L00T U I 2007-2020 (c) ::
Echo ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
ECHO ENjoy and make alot of fycking shops :)
Echo WE are not anti leach
Echo DONT leach this please :]
Echo Friends: mod Taharok, nwfd, rudolph, masterp00n, devil cry, divinity, kupo, hippyss, and tacoboyy
Echo After your done find the things in a text file named shops
Echo Do Not rush it and use letters, ur only ruinning it for urself
Echo.
:shopcfg
SET /P ShopID=Whats your shop id?
SET /P ShopName=And the name of  your shop?
SET /P Sell=Sell (Usually 1)? 
SET /P Buy=Buy (Usually 1)? 
SET string=shop = %ShopID%	%ShopName%	%Sell%	%Buy%	
:additem
SET /P Item=item id pl0x?: 
SET /P Amount=and the amount?: 
SET string=%string%	%Item%	%Amount%	
SET /P itemagain=wanna add another item?(y/n)? 
@if %itemagain%==y GOTO additem
SET /P NpcID=whats the shop keepers id?
SET /P CoordX=Shopkeeper's X coord? 
SET /P CoordY=Shopkeeper's Y coord? 
SET /P Height=Shopkeeper Height? 
SET /P RangeX1=Shopkeeper Range X1? 
SET /P RangeY1=Shopkeeper about Range Y1? 
SET /P RangeX2=Shopkeeper Range X2? 
SET /P RangeY2=Shopkeeper Range Y2? 
SET /P WalkType=Shopkeeper Walk Type pl0x?
SET /P Description=Shopkeeper Description? 
SET autospawn=spawn = %NpcID%	%CoordX%	%CoordY%	%Height%	%RangeX1%	%RangeX2%	%RangeX2%	%RangeY2%	%WalkType%	%Description%	
SET client1=} else if (NPCID == %NpcID%) {
SET client2=	PutNPCCoords = true; >> "Shops.txt"
SET client3=	WanneShop = %ShopID%; >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO. >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO %string% >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO. >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO Add this line to shops.cfg. under the last shop >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO. >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO. >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO %autospawn% >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO. >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO Add this line to autospawn.cfg. Above you know >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO. >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO.
ECHO %client1% >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO %client2% >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO %client3% >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ >> "Shops.txt"
ECHO Add this lines to client.java with your shops. search wanne shop (ctrl+F) wannae shop >> "Shops.txt"
----------Shop Logs---------- >> "Shops.txt"
echo. >> "Shops.txt"
goto menu
SET /P Again=Make another Shop(y/n)? 
@if %again%==y GOTO shopcfg
